dtliExcerpt: Aaron Sorkin's adaptation of Harper Lee's beloved novel is a masterful reimagining that brings new urgency and complexity to this American classic. Jeff Daniels delivers a powerfully nuanced performance as Atticus Finch.
showScoreExcerpt: Aaron Sorkin's adaptation of Harper Lee's beloved novel is a masterful reimagining that brings new urgency and complexity to this American classic. Jeff Daniels delivers a powerfully nuanced performance as Atticus Finch.
